net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.hashing

Class BitSampling

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.indexing.hashing.BitSampling

  • public class BitSampling
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a simple way to hashing. It's bit sampling and can be put into the locality sensitive hashing family of hashing functions.

    Created: 24.02.12, 14:00

    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at

      • readHashFunctions

        public static double[][][] readHashFunctions()
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a file from disk, where the hash bundles are specified. Make sure to generate it first and make sure to re-use it for search. This method reads the in class specified file relative to the execution directory.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readHashFunctions

        public static double[][][] readHashFunctions(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a file from a given InputStream, where the hash bundles are specified. Make sure to generate it first and make sure to re-use it for search.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - to access the data, most likely a File on a hard disk
        Returns:
        Throws:
